basic.description: Topological equivalence and topological invariants; homotopy and the fundamental group; covering spaces; homotopy type; Brower's fixed point theorem; triangularization; homology and cohomology groups.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Algebraic Topology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    (MATH310 or MATH313) and (MATH328 or [MATH326 with permission of the Department]).
